name: Questas
tagline: Build interactive stories with AI images and videos
description: Questas lets you build choose-your-own-adventure stories with AI-generated images and videos. Start with a character and a simple concept, and Questas turns it into a branching story you can edit, share, and play through like an interactive book.

name: FireCut for DaVinci Resolve
tagline: Your lightning-fast AI video editor
description: FireCut for DaVinci Resolve boosts your editing productivity by bringing AI seamlessly into your workflow, and speeding up all the repetitive tasks like cleaning up footage, adding zoom cuts, detecting chapters, clipping shorts from longform, editing podcasts, and much more!

name: Rubber Duck
tagline: Catch App Store rejection issues before Apple does.
description: Rubber Duck scans your iOS app before you submit it to the App Store. We combine automated checks with human testers on real devices to catch the issues Apple flags the most: crashes, incomplete build flows, missing privacy data, inconsistent metadata, broken onboarding, and more. Upload your IPA ‚Üí we test ‚Üí you get a clear actionable Duck Report.

name: Orion 1.0
tagline: WebKit. Extensions. Privacy. Check icon Pick all three.
description: Orion ‚Äî a web browser designed from the ground-up. Native WebKit speed, full extension compatibility, and absolute privacy is finally together in one browser that respects you.

name: AskCodi
tagline: Custom LLMs, without training. Use via openai compatible api
description: We provide an OpenAI-compatible orchestration layer that lets teams compose their own ‚Äúvirtual models‚Äù on top of any LLM - combining prompts, reasoning, review, and guardrails, and use them everywhere from your IDE to your backend. Key features üîå One OpenAI-compatible API for many LLMs üß± Custom models you name & reuse üß† Reasoning mode on demand ‚úÖ Built-in review mode üõ°Ô∏è Guardrails & PII masking üßë‚Äçüíª IDE & CLI integrations üìä Analytics & cost controls

name: Eva
tagline: Just speak your ideas & Eva turns them into content & posts
description: Meet Eva ‚Äî a voice-to-content assistant inside Evatar. Just talk, and Eva turns ideas into ready posts, visuals or videos. Eva also lets you create social-media agents for specific tasks: Affiliative Mode ‚Äî helps you sell products by automatically generating short videos about them Promotional Mode ‚Äî define the role yourself; it acts exactly as you describe in your own words OnlineLM Mode ‚Äî creates engaging videos based on what‚Äôs relevant to you and your industry from trending topics online

name: DemoStudio
tagline: Recorder & Editor for better-looking product demos
description: Record/Upload screen recordings, add zooms, crops, speed-ups, change backgrounds, add shadows & borders, generate custom backgrounds, and export in any resolution up to 4k for Free, straight on your browser!

name: „ÉÑSupercut for Windows
tagline: The Windows Screen Recorder that won't make you sweat.
description: Best-in-class screen recording from „ÉÑSupercut now comes natively to Windows. *Blazing Native Speed* Built in native code for best-in-class performance, so your machine does not break a sweat. *Up to 4K Resolution* Record your screen and camera in crisp 4K quality and make sure your work is crystal clear. *Instant Sharing* Share instantly without waiting. Your video is ready to send the moment you stop recording.

name: InterviewFlowAI - AI Interviews
tagline: AI-powered phone & meet interviews for faster screening
description: InterviewFlowAI automates the entire first-round hiring workflow, resume scoring, candidate applications, and AI-powered phone/Google Meet interviews. Employers can make a job public, share a link for candidates to apply, view resume scores instantly, and send interview links automatically with one click. Each interview includes a score summary, transcript, and recording, all at just $0.50 per interview. Fast, accurate screening with minimal effort.

name: SlopCollector
tagline: Find the slop in your supabase
description: The raccoon that cleans up your database mess. Connect Supabase, find missing indexes, catch slow queries.

name: Convo
tagline: Meeting automation: tasks, briefs, feedback & more
description: Convo helps people handle meetings end-to-end. It prepares you before the call, supports you during key moments, and automates the follow-up after. During calls, Convo listens locally and suggests what to say next. After the meeting, it drafts emails, updates tasks, and summarizes key decisions.

name: FocusMap
tagline: Turn your tasks into a roadmap and shape it by real feedback
description: Solo founders juggle every role and often get stuck in a builder loop where building never stops and marketing or selling gets ignored. Many quit before they ever launch. FocusMap brings clarity by turning scattered tasks into a focused build, sell and market workflow and making it easy to turn tasks into a public roadmap shaped by real user feedback.

name: Makersfuel
tagline: Practice vibe coding on real full-stack projects
description: Makersfuel is a project-based learning platform for vibe coders. Instead of random tutorials, you pick complete full-stack projects (ChatGPT, Twitter, Gmail, etc.) and follow a clear step-by-step playbook with detailed build breakdowns from setup ‚Üí deployment, battle-tested AI prompts for each step and guidance on writing PRDs and specs. The goal: help you actually learn what it takes to ship a real app end-to-end.

name: Locally AI Chat with your documents
tagline: Analyze, extract, summarize files locally, just by asking.
description: You can now chat with your documents in Locally AI. Analyze, extract, summarize, and more, just by asking. Everything stays on your device.

name: Noise & Texture 2.0
tagline: A Figma plugin to add textures and shader effects.
description: The next evolution of Noise & Texture, version 2.0 is here. With this update, it's easier to embed shaders, add shader effects and textures to images. In addition, I've redesigned the UI and the plugin snappier.

name: Crux Legacy
tagline: Organise your life!
description: Crux helps you protect what matters, your vital documents, memories, and wishes, all in one secure digital vault. With Crux, you can store important information, add trusted nominees, and leave messages or time capsules for your loved ones. It‚Äôs not about planning for death, it's about organising life for yourself and for your loved ones. Be there, because you care!

name: AskAI by Ordemio
tagline: Free Ask AI Agent for tech products and dev docs
description: Ask AI is built for complex and technical products that answers your users questions in your documentation, product interface, or Discord/Slack community. With your own OpenAI API key, you can use it for completely free as long as you want. It is fully trained on your data, so it directly answers from your sources.

name: Validate Your Idea Before Building
tagline: Validate your Idea first then start building
description: Validate your Idea before spending months building something nobody wants. we all have been there, spending months and months building an idea that we thought was brilliant, but nobody cared üòû Validate first then start building.

name: Adventure Box
tagline: Turn screen time into family time!
description: Break the screen addiction cycle with AI-powered, personalized activities. Get daily screen-free adventures tailored to your child's interests, your schedule, and what you have at home. No more scrolling, just family moments that build bonds.

name: FLUX.2
tagline: Frontier visual intelligence at 4MP resolution
description: FLUX.2 is the next generation of image models from Black Forest Labs. It introduces multi-reference support (combining up to 10 images), 4MP editing, and superior photorealism. Available in Pro, Flex, and open-weight Dev versions, it's designed for real production workflows.
